author: San Lin

author: forgiven12

text:
I like this song (and this game too). I have a playlist of all the 7 BGM sountracks in this game and play them from time to time just for the music itself.

Why the game itself is not so popular might be that it's polish is below par. It's GFX is primitive and glichy, and although its AI is quite smart, it has some major memory leak issues that cause frequent hangs or even crashes. Even a big fan as me can't stand this. But I still enjoy playing it so much - mostly because of the music.
